name: Keep Talking & Don't Sink the Ship!
name_original: Keep Talking & Don't Sink the Ship!
description:
Puzzle-like game done in 48 hours. You need to change the pipes' direction in a navy ship to send the right transmission to the right person. If you fail, you'll sink it!

Programmers: Francisco Anderson & Iago Lobo
Artits: Mariana Martins, Felipe Collares & Fernanda Noronha
Logo & Music: Fernanda Noronha

Global Game Jam 2018 game page: https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/keep-talking-dont-sink-ship
